wikipedia_page.main: Matt Clark (born 16 November 1992) is an English football midfielder who plays for Southern League side North Leigh.

response: Matthew or Matt Clark may also refer to:
*Matt Clark (writer) (1967–1998), short story writer and novelist
*Matt Clark (The Young and the Restless), a fictional character from the American CBS soap opera The Young and the Restless
*Matt Clark (artist), creative director of United Visual Artists and an album cover designer
